snippet: Ezra Klein, an analyst, columnist and television commentator who runs The Washington Post’s Wonkblog, is said to have failed to win backing for a new website.
abstract: Ezra Klein, analyst, columnist and television commentator who runs The Washington Post’s Wonkblog, is preparing to leave the newspaper; move comes after Klein failed to win support for creating a new website within the company.
lead_paragraph: Ezra Klein, an analyst, columnist and television commentator who runs The Washington Post’s Wonkblog, is said to have failed to win backing for a new website.

headline.main: Ezra Klein Is Said to Plan to Leave Washington Post
headline.print_headline: Blogger Said to Plan to Leave The Post
